title: He's My Daughter Now (CRS144)
description:
A Classic RISK! Singles episode! A story that Justin Aufwerk first shared on the podcast in June of 2016 about parenting a transgender child.

Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK

author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Justin Aufwerk, kevin allison)
